article_title: Seniors Rush To Medicare's Star-Rated Plans Under ACA

article_metadata.description: An effort under the Affordable Care Act to encourage the health insurance industry to provide quality benefits to seniors is rewarding higher-rated plans with an unprecedented number of Medicare beneficiaries. There are now 72%, or about 12 million, of the 17 million elderly in private Medicare Advantage products in a plan [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
